resources.string: Martha Stewart is my baking icon.
I will always remember the titans.
I snort more than the average elephant.
The best part of waking up is Foldgers in your cup.
Julia Roberts might have a very large home.
Don\'t forget to pack your backpack full of vittles.
Sheila Racecar is not a real person.
A little bit of Sandra in the sun? No, no thanks.
Impatience can occasionally be a virtue.
